abstract: New York Mets owners Saul Katz and Fred Wilpon are seeking to avoid a jury trial in case filed against them by Irving H Picard, trustee for the victims of Bernard L Madoff's fraud, indication that they feel confident in rolling the dice with Judge Jed S Rakoff.
snippet: The request may indicate that Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz are willing to roll the dice with the federal judge presiding over their case.
lead_paragraph: The request may indicate that Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz are willing to roll the dice with the federal judge presiding over their case.
